entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as looking like James Potter.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: A bald black wizard who comments on Harry's resemblance to James.

entities.description: Harry's father, mentioned as the person Harry resembles.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: A wizard with mismatched eyes and a missing chunk from his nose.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A wizard who is asked if he is sure it's Harry.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: The witch who comments on Harry's resemblance to James.
